messages.message:
Hi @Anil @tony.shi @Abhishek Adupa, I was thinking of moving https://docs.instabase.com/api-sdk/api-reference/runs/get-run-results api from `/apps/runs` ->  `/runs` namespace . Given that this API is used for fetching results in both apps and deployments, and will eventually be used for ground truth dataset runs in as well, I feel that it makes more sense to move it to a namespace that's more generic.

I can go ahead and implement the change in the next few weeks, just wanted to run it by you first
Eventually I also want to add run results correction apis (for modifying field values, class labels, etc.)
We need to maintain backward compatibility ig, these apis are being used by customers
Also sdk relies on the existing paths
Yeah we can still keep the old path, just have it point to the same ResultsView class

We cannot change public APIs
apps/runs is fine
If apps/runs points to the same flask class (ResultsView) what’s the issue
Maintaining backwards compatibility makes sense but there should be some room for change right

The apps/runs API is going to around for a long time. We can’t delete this endpoint as it is public.
Adding /runs is more fragmentation. No body has complained about this - we should not fix something that is not broken.

Ground truth runs are rare, you can use the same results API.
